title: Spoken English
desciption: Improve your communication skills in the workplace with a focus on grammar, vocabulary and pronunciation

title: IELTS
desciption: You can learn tips, hacks and techniques according to the question type of IELTS speaking, reading, listening and writing test.

title: English Grammar Course
desciption: This course includes Parts of Speech, Number, Gender, Article, Sentence, Tense, Right form of Verbs, Transformation, Voice, Narration, Modifiers, Connectors, and much more. So what are you waiting for? Enroll in this course today and become the boss of English grammar!

title: Graphic Design
desciption: In this course, will teach you the basics of Adobe Photoshop and walk you through the tools of this software.

title: Web Design
desciption: This Web Design course will provide you with the complete guideline to start your career as a web designer.

title: Programing For Kids
desciption: By teaching them how websites, games and applications work and how to develop them.By teaching the basics of a useful programming language.By introducing them to the world of coding, as well as application, website, and game development.
